name: Eggy and Chicky - EGGSercise!
description:
Made by me (qFrct) during the Ludum Dare 46: 18th-21st April 2020.

Story

Control Chicky, a little poussin just free from self-isolation, who has to roll his brother Eggy to the incubator.
Don't break him!

Advice

Don't go too fast, don't make the egg fall. And as a reward, a little cute scene at the end (and yes you can cheat, but don't ^^).

The level is quite long, around 15mn to complete.

Controls
  • Restart: R/Back.
  • Pause: P/Esc/Start.
  • Move: Controller or WASD/Arrows + Mouse.
  • Run: Any button.
  • EGGSit: Delete.

Had no time for audio, sorry.

Enjoy : )
